definition: English Language Teaching (ELT)/studying and teaching English
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]

sentences.english: This paper lays stress on the fulfillment of students' initiative in English teaching.
sentences.chinese: 本文强调在英语教学中应始终发挥学生的主体作用。

sentences.english: And vocabulary teaching is of great importance to ELT in China.
sentences.chinese: 词汇教学在英语教学中有着重要的地位和作用。

sentences.english: The correct use of body language in English teaching can improve the teaching effect.
sentences.chinese: 在英语教学中，正确使用身势语，可以提高教学效果。

sentences.english: In the author's opinion, a sole approach is not appropriate for English teaching in China.
sentences.chinese: 单一教学法不符合当今中国中学英语教学实际情况。

sentences.english: We believe that these three perspectives will contribute to the nativization of English teaching in China.
sentences.chinese: 这三个视角有助于推动中国英语教学本土化的进程。

sentences.english: Teaching in English is the selling point of the local education system.
sentences.chinese: 英语教学是本港教育制度的卖点。

sentences.english: The use of network resources to build a new model for secondary school English teaching.
sentences.chinese: 利用网络资源构建中学英语教学的新模式。

sentences.english: In English teaching, the first class and the second class promote each other.
sentences.chinese: 在英语教学中，第一课堂与第二课堂是相互促进的。

sentences.english: It is generally believed that teaching of the English language in China began with Tong Wen Guan (The Imperial College of Translators).
sentences.chinese: 人们一般认为中国学校英语教学肇始于京师同文馆。

sentences.english: The third part studies the arriving place of English teaching spread.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分对英语教学传播的到达场进行研究。

sentences.english: He is now engaged in English teaching and research and the member of The Vineyard Poetry Quarterly .
sentences.chinese: 现从事英语教学与研究，为《葡萄园》诗社同仁。

sentences.english: I have taught English in the vocational class.
sentences.chinese: 一直以来，担任高职班的英语教学。

sentences.english: The functions of British-American literature in teaching English as a foreign language cannot be neglected.
sentences.chinese: 英美文学在大学英语教学中的重要作用不可忽视。

sentences.english: The advent of the Age of Information brings about bright prospects to TEFL.
sentences.chinese: 信息时代的到来为英语教学的发展带来新的契机。

sentences.english: At the same time of teaching English, we should also teach the related knowledge of cross- culture communication.
sentences.chinese: 在英语教学的同时应辅以跨文化交际相关知识的传授。

sentences.english: Chen Liji, who has graduated from the Huaian Normal University, has serious experiences in English teaching.
sentences.chinese: 陈丽吉毕业于淮阴师范学院，有丰富的英语教学经验。

definition: to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
to give classes/to work as a teacher
